cats.Name: Gray Grizzly
cats.Personality: distant and cautious except for when he's hungry, then he'll stand behind you and meow until you leave! Sometimes can be found in a tree. Is visually impaired.

cats.Name: Scout
cats.Pattern: a Brown Tabby with White on Face
cats.Personality: shy.

cats.Name: Pluto
cats.Personality: occasionally seen roaming.

cats.Name: Simba
cats.Pattern: an Orange Tabby with White under Chin
cats.Personality: partially deaf and usually stays in the bushes, but recognizes feeders and waits for them. Sometimes is very chatty.

cats.Name: Snickers
cats.Personality: keeping Simba company in his lonely old age, though is afraid of people.

cats.Name: Tiffany
cats.Personality: patient for feeders even though she tries to trip them and only sometimes tolerates petting

cats.Name: Torti Mama
cats.Personality: not always seen, but occasionally follows feeders. Usually does not allow petting.

cats.Name: Shyla
cats.Personality: mostly interested in food but doesn't mind people.

cats.Name: Garfield
cats.Personality: frequently found sunning on the shelters.

cats.Name: Finn
cats.Personality: elusive.

cats.Name: Ringo
cats.Pattern: a Long Hair Brownish Gray Tabby with White Bib
cats.Personality: elusive.

cats.Name: Sammy
cats.Personality: often found waiting to be pet on top of a pillar, but also roams around Cox, where he also waits to be pet.

cats.Name: Pereza
cats.Personality: a momma of adopted kittens.

cats.Name: Laura Phi
cats.Personality: usually only seen at night or with Alan, one of our campus police.

cats.Name: Precious
cats.Personality: very social by running up to feeders and demanding chin scratches! Very snuggly with Sassy.

cats.Name: Tiger
cats.Personality: generally keeping his distance but will approach for food.

cats.Name: Sassy
cats.Personality: very social by running up to feeders and demanding chin scratches! Very snuggly with Precious.

cats.Name: Amal
cats.Pattern: a Long Hair White Brown Tabby
cats.Personality: the most elusive of the Dawson-Dyer clan, but is typically very chatty when she does come out.

cats.Name: Damien
cats.Personality: sometimes seen wandering around the science buildings or the grassy area outside Airline Garage.

cats.Name: Skeeter
cats.Personality: a mystery to us as he was believed to have passed away, but then spontaneously returned after several months of no appearances!

cats.Name: Legend
cats.Personality: elusive.

cats.Name: London
cats.Personality: elusive.

cats.Name: Liberty
cats.Personality: elusive.

cats.Name: Lola
cats.Personality: elusive.

cats.Name: Mona
cats.Personality: fairly territorial, even asserting her dominance at other stations.

cats.Name: Rousseau
cats.Personality: elusive.

cats.Name: Dewey
cats.Pattern: a Gray & White Long Hair Tux with White Feet
cats.Personality: elusive.

cats.Name: Tails
cats.Personality: outgoing and friendly! Loves to lounge under the big tree!

cats.Name: Mars
cats.Personality: elusive.

cats.Name: Gray Ghost
cats.Personality: elusive.
